Name: Wave Link
Description: Control the Elgato Wave Link audio mixing application.

com.elgato.wavelink.inputaction.Tooltip: Set, adjust, or mute volume for an input and mix

com.elgato.wavelink.mixermute.Tooltip: Set, adjust, or mute volume for an input and mix

com.elgato.wavelink.adjustvolumemixer.Tooltip: Set, adjust, or mute volume for an input and mix

com.elgato.wavelink.outputaction.Tooltip: Set, adjust, and mute output volume, or switch between mixes

com.elgato.wavelink.monitormute.Tooltip: Set, adjust, and mute output volume, or switch between mixes

com.elgato.wavelink.adjustvolumemonitor.Tooltip: Set, adjust, and mute output volume, or switch between mixes

com.elgato.wavelink.switchmonitoring.Name: Output
com.elgato.wavelink.switchmonitoring.Tooltip: Set, adjust, and mute output volume, or switch between mixes

com.elgato.wavelink.hardwareaction.Name: Device
com.elgato.wavelink.hardwareaction.Tooltip: Control Wave device settings or switch between audio outputs

com.elgato.wavelink.setmonitormixoutput.Name: Device
com.elgato.wavelink.setmonitormixoutput.Tooltip: Control Wave device settings or switch between audio outputs

com.elgato.wavelink.togglemonitormixoutp.Tooltip: Control Wave device settings or switch between audio outputs

com.elgato.wavelink.setmicsettings.Tooltip: Control Wave device settings or switch between audio outputs

com.elgato.wavelink.effectaction.Tooltip: Toggle individual effects or an entire effects chain
